languages.text: "Тринадцатый Универсальный закон подтверждает твои слова. Знания древних неоспоримы. Но провести грань между древними и теми, кто шел по их стопам и мог ошибаться — непростая задача". {n}В голосе техножреца звучит сомнение. Грохочущая глубина оставляет вокс Паскаля, возвращая ему привычные шипящие интонации.{/n}

"The Thirteenth Universal Law attests to the truth of your words. The knowledge of the ancients is above questioning. However, drawing the line between the ancients and the fallible ones who followed in their footsteps is no easy task." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Тринадцатый Универсальный закон подтверждает твои слова. Знания древних неоспоримы. Но провести грань между древними и теми, кто шел по их стопам и мог ошибаться — непростая задача". {n}В голосе техножреца звучит сомнение. languages.text: 「13の宇宙法があなたの言葉の真実を立証する。古代の知識は探究心を超越している。しかし、古代人とその後に不完全な者の間に線を引くのは簡単なことではない」{n}技術司祭の声には疑いの響きがあった。雷鳴のような深みのある声音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえなくなり、かわりに聞き慣れたシューシューという音が聞こえた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Thirteenth Universal Law attests to the truth of your words. The knowledge of the ancients is above questioning. However, drawing the line between the ancients and the fallible ones who followed in their footsteps is no easy task." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「13の宇宙法があなたの言葉の真実を立証する。古代の知識は探究心を超越している。しかし、古代人とその後に不完全な者の間に線を引くのは簡単なことではない」{n}技術司祭の声には疑いの響きがあった。雷鳴のような深みのある声音がパスカルのヴォクスから聞こえなくなり、かわりに聞き慣れたシューシューという音が聞こえた。{/n}

languages.text: “普适准则第十三条可以证明，你的话语是正确的。先人留下来的智慧的不容置疑，然而，若要看清楚哪些是先人祖留下的智慧，哪些又是后来者自行制定的规则，这并非易事。”{n}帕斯卡声音中雷鸣般的低沉声音不见了，他的声音又带上了平时的咝咝声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Thirteenth Universal Law attests to the truth of your words. The knowledge of the ancients is above questioning. However, drawing the line between the ancients and the fallible ones who followed in their footsteps is no easy task." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “普适准则第十三条可以证明，你的话语是正确的。先人留下来的智慧的不容置疑，然而，若要看清楚哪些是先人祖留下的智慧，哪些又是后来者自行制定的规则，这并非易事。”{n}帕斯卡声音中雷鸣般的低沉声音不见了，他的声音又带上了平时的咝咝声。{/n}

languages.text: "Das dreizehnte Universalgesetz bestätigt die Wahrheit Eurer Worte. Das Wissen der Altvorderen kann nicht angezweifelt werden. Doch ist es keine leichte Aufgabe, die Grenze zu ziehen zwischen den Altvorderen und den Fehlbaren, die in ihre Fußstapfen getreten sind." {n}In der Stimme des Techpriesters liegt Zweifel. Der Unterton der donnernden Tiefgründigkeit schwindet aus Pasqals Vox und weicht seinem üblichen Zischen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Thirteenth Universal Law attests to the truth of your words. The knowledge of the ancients is above questioning. However, drawing the line between the ancients and the fallible ones who followed in their footsteps is no easy task." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

Doch ist es keine leichte Aufgabe, die Grenze zu ziehen zwischen den Altvorderen und den Fehlbaren, die in ihre Fußstapfen getreten sind." {n}In der Stimme des Techpriesters liegt Zweifel. Der Unterton der donnernden Tiefgründigkeit schwindet aus Pasqals Vox und weicht seinem üblichen Zischen.{/n}

languages.text: « La treizième Loi Universelle corrobore vos propos. La connaissance des anciens est indiscutable. Cependant, il n'est guère facile de distinguer ces augustes précurseurs des êtres faillibles qui ont par la suite marché sur leurs traces. » {n}Vous ne décelez pas l'ombre d'un doute dans la voix du technoprêtre. La profondeur habitée qui animait le vox de Pasqal reflue et laisse place à son sifflement coutumier.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Thirteenth Universal Law attests to the truth of your words. The knowledge of the ancients is above questioning. However, drawing the line between the ancients and the fallible ones who followed in their footsteps is no easy task." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

Cependant, il n'est guère facile de distinguer ces augustes précurseurs des êtres faillibles qui ont par la suite marché sur leurs traces. » {n}Vous ne décelez pas l'ombre d'un doute dans la voix du technoprêtre. La profondeur habitée qui animait le vox de Pasqal reflue et laisse place à son sifflement coutumier.{/n}

languages.text: «La Decimotercera Ley Universal atestigua la veracidad de sus palabras. Los conocimientos de los antiguos son incuestionables. Sin embargo, trazar una línea entre los antiguos y los falibles que siguieron sus pasos no es tarea baladí». {n}Percibes duda en la afirmación del tecnosacerdote. El tono de atronadora profundidad abandona la voz de Pasqal, dando paso a su familiar sibilancia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Thirteenth Universal Law attests to the truth of your words. The knowledge of the ancients is above questioning. However, drawing the line between the ancients and the fallible ones who followed in their footsteps is no easy task." {n}There is doubt in the Tech-Priest's voice. The tone of thundering profundity drains from Pasqal's vox, giving way to his familiar sibilance.{/n}

languages.text: "On Üçüncü Evrensel Kanun, sözcüklerinizin doğruluğunu tasdik ediyor. Atalarımızın bilgisinin sorgulanmaması gerekir. Atalarımızın bilgisi ve onların izinden gidenlerin ortaya koyduğu hatalı bilgiler arasındaki çizgiyi çekmek ise kolay değildir." {n}Tekno Rahip'in sesinde tereddüt var. O gürleyen derinlik Pasqal'ın voksundan kayboluyor, yerini tanıdık bir vızıltıya bırakıyor.{/n}
